text:
June 2010 - DRW - This edit to the Sharon Classification  was made according to Amendment 1 of the  FIRST AMENDMENT TO THE CLASSIFICATION AND CORRELATION OF THE SOILS OF WHITE COUNTY, ILLINOIS

The Sharon Series was changed:
From: Coarse-silty, mixed, active, acid, mesic Oxyaquic Udifluvents
To: Coarse-silty, mixed, active, mesic Oxyaquic Dystrudepts
Flooding frequency and slope were added to the map unit name.
06/07/1999 - DRW -- Created ilss0340C3 for the slope correlation of Pope County.
